alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 27 at 10:18PM MST until December 28 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Central Carbon County and North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 4 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Areas of falling and blowing snow with near quarter mile visibility at times. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Brief periods of snow squall conditions with low visibility due to falling and blowing snow. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; North Snowy Range Foothills
